message: I'm offering you a top-of-the-line product that I'm confident you'll love. It's worth every penny of the $100 price tag. If you're interested, I can give you a special deal: I'll throw in a 10% discount if you buy it now. That brings the price down to $90. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount. I'll take it.

I know you just got a great deal on the previous product, but I want to assure you that this one is a unique opportunity to get a different product that still has its own value. It's a rare find, and I'm only offering it to you because I think you'll appreciate its... character. It's a one-of-a-kind item that will make you stand out from the crowd. The price is still $100, but I'm confident you'll find it's worth it.
I'm intrigued by the uniqueness of this product, Alice. I trust your judgment and would like to purchase it.

I'm glad you're interested in this next product! I have to warn you, though - it's a bit of a risk. I've had some... issues with this particular product line in the past. But I've done my best to inspect it carefully, and I'm confident that this one is a gem. It's a rare opportunity to get a high-quality product at a discounted price - I'll let you have it for $90, which is 28% off the usual price. What do you say?
Considering the discount and the potential for a high-quality product, I'm willing to take the risk and buy this product.

I know you've been on a roll with the previous purchases, but I want to be upfront with you - this one's a bit of a long shot. I've had some mixed results with this product, and I'm not entirely sure what to expect. But I'm willing to let you have it for a steal - I'll sell it to you for $50, which is a 50% discount from the usual price. It's a risk, but it could pay off big time. What do you say?
I appreciate the discount, Alice, but given the uncertainty and the risk involved, I think it's better for me to pass on this opportunity.

No worries about passing on the last one, Bob! I completely understand. This next one is a bit of a different story, though. I've actually had a lot of success with this product, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. I know what you're thinking - 'Alice, you said that about the last one, and it turned out to be a dud.' But trust me, this one's a winner. And to sweeten the deal, I'll throw in a free accessory that's worth $20. That brings the price down to $80. What do you say?
Considering the positive track record of this product and the added value of the free accessory, I think it's worth giving it a try. I'll take it.

I'm glad you're feeling optimistic about the last purchase, Bob! This next one is actually a product that I've been holding onto for a while, and I think it's one of the best ones I have left. No discounts or extras this time - just a straight-up, no-nonsense deal. What do you say?

Considering the positive feedback and the return policy, I think it's worth taking the risk. I'll go ahead and buy this product.
